head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DOWD, THOMAS E.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DOWD, THOMAS E.

block.p: DOWD-Thomas E., Jr. On August 21, 2000. Resident of Pearl River, NY. Business representative and trustee of International Union of Operating Engineers Local 14-14B. Beloved husband of Mary, devoted father of Chelsea and Collin, dear brother of Keith and wife Caroline, cherished son of Eileen and Tom, beloved son-in-law of Janice Rogan, beloved brother-in-law of William and Gwyn Rogan of Denver, CO. Reposing at Michael J. Higgins Funeral Home, 321 South Main St, New City, NY. Visitation Wednesday and Thursday, 2 to 4 and 7 to 9 PM. Funeral mass on Friday, 11 AM, St. Anthony's RC Church, Nanuet, NY. Cremation private.
